overview: Rabbit is tired of Tigger always bouncing him, so he gets Pooh and Piglet together to come up with an idea to get the bounce out of Tigger. Then, Tigger and little Roo go out for a bounce and get caught in a tree.
original_title: Winnie the Pooh and Tigger Too
tagline: It's POOH-fectly TIGGER-ific and it's ALL NEW
cast: Sebastian Cabot|Dori Whitaker|Paul Winchell|Sterling Holloway|John Fiedler
